content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5), (34.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) connecting the drills and chests
Current status: Most drills out of fuel, chests contain varying amounts of coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Multiple burner inserters connecting components
- Transport belt system starting at (-29.5,-60.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large mining setup with:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Multiple electricity poles forming power network

### Research Lab at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
- Single lab connected to power network
- Currently working on automation research

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Ensure mining drills and inserters have adequate fuel supply before they run out
- Implement automatic refueling system for continuous operation

### Belt Management
- Clear blocked transport belts to prevent backup in production line
- Ensure proper spacing between belt segments for optimal flow

### Space Management
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Empty full chests regularly to maintain production flow

### Power Network Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power generation
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to maintain network integrity
